text: Paulius Petrilevičius (born March 23, 1991) is a professional Lithuanian basketball player. He plays in the power forward position. == Professional career == Petrilevičius started his career in third-tier Regional Basketball League by signing with JAZZ-Diremta Birštonas. == References == Category:Living people Category:1991 births Category:BC Dzūkija players Category:BC Juventus players Category:BC Nevėžis players Category:BC Pieno žvaigždės players Category:Lithuanian men's basketball players Category:LSU- Atletas basketball players Category:Power forwards (basketball) Category:Sportspeople from Kėdainiai
title: Paulius Petrilevičius
